**What does a Lead Account Executive do?**
***Emphasis***
  

  

* Key
+ Lead our Swedish Sales Team consisting of both business developers and account executives
+ Achieve predetermined budget
+ Generate ARR/customer growth


  

  

* Development
+ Scale your business together with the team in a sustainable way
+ Protect/breath the team-and company culture (cfr. the way we do things)
+ Motivate and inspire your team to achieve and surpass their goals and reach an overall high level of performance (raising the bar)


**Responsibilities** 
  

  

* Market Leadership
+ Grow the market footprint
+ Ensure that each local customer becomes an ambassador and generates opportunities using all available resources;
+ Actively contribute to the implementation/adjustment of the regional strategy and execute it at fast pace using a mix of sales and marketing levers;
+ Work closely with other teams to deliver market insights, help identify and address business/product priorities and enable BrightAnalytics to stay ahead of the market;
+ Maintain gameplans, playbooks and other content to make winning strategies scalable.


  

  

* Revenue generation
+ Reach regional team budget
+ Make sure revenue team members reach their ARR targets
+ Forecast revenue and potential business growth in the region;
+ Responsible for regional pipeline (fuel + follow up)
+ Put sufficient emphasis on the importance of pipeline management (lead by example)


  

  

* Lead generation
+ Make sure our Business Development Team generates enough leads via combined business-marketing development actions to fuel our sales pipe;
+ Monitor lead quality and manage our lead pipeeline
+ Maintain- and expand our partner network
+ Detect new market opportunities


***People***
  

  

* Recruitment
+ Hire, train, lead and retain a top-performing team


  

  

* Onboarding
+ Manage/ support the onboarding process in line with the onboarding plan


  

  

* Coaching/training
+ Act as a coach to ensure that our global processes and best practices are being adopted in an efficient way
+ Protect/breath the team-and company culture (cfr. the way we do things)
+ Motivate and inspire your team to achieve and surpass their goals and reach an overall high level of performance (raising the bar)
+ Approach: shadow sessions, roleplays, call/ meeting analysis, recap sessions, pop up quizzes
+ Test/monitor knowledge on a permanent basis
+ Expand knowledge when needed


**Who are you?**
* Masters degree in business
* +/- 5 years experience in a business/people/sales role
* Fluency in Swedish is essential due to the platform’s complexity, and fluency in English is a must in our international environment;
* Highly people oriented
* Ambitious, energized and target oriented


**What can you expect from us?**
* You will be part of driven, dynamic and enthusiastic team in a varied job;
* Weekly internal training sessions and on-the-job coaching will teach you unique skills that will serve you well throughout your career;
* We are a financially healthy scale-up with international growth ambitions;
* We have an open business culture with room for personal initiative;
* A competitive salary & motivating bonus system.

title: Opticos Graduate Program - Aug 2026
description:
Join our team of management consultants focusing on services within our capability areas: Digital Business Transformation, Strategy & Business Development, Strategic IT, and Sourcing & Procurement. Opticos combines a mix of skills and years of experience with a hands-on, yet forward-thinking approach. We support large organisations with independent advice and execution in order to improve performance and achieve lasting business value. Be a part of our journey to make a difference!
 










**Opticos Graduate Program introduces talents to the world of management consulting in an exciting and efficient way.** 



* It is a 1-year graduate program where you will work with, and be mentored by, Opticos consultants on client projects
* A senior colleague will be your development coach to ensure your personal and professional growth
* You will have the opportunity to travel to our two offices in Sweden for program courses, special events, and social activities. In addition, you will also go on a graduation trip to our office in India
* After the program, you will continue your career with us as a management consultant




 This helps you to get to know other consultants – and have some fun along the way!
 










**What more can we offer you?** 



* We have high standards of client delivery, combined with a sound work-life balance
* An opportunity to work in a growing, entrepreneurial team where you really can make a difference, both to clients and colleagues
* We enjoy spending time together, whether it is social events or sports, and we promote a healthy lifestyle
* We offer a competitive compensation package









**Requirements** 



* Graduate with a one- or two-year Master’s Degree within Business, Engineering, or similar field
* Business proficient Swedish and English skills









**We recruit graduates to our offices in Gothenburg and Stockholm with start in August 2026.** 











 Apply with your CV, personal letter and university grades in English.
 
**The application period will close October 26th 2025.**

title: MAX are looking for new co-workers!
description:
*MAX is not only Sweden’s favourite burger restaurant chain, it is also one of the first. Back in 1968 the founders of MAX, Curt Bergfors and Britta Andersson, opened their first restaurant in Gällivare, high up in the northern parts of Sweden. Today we are more than 5000 employees in several countries and we are constantly growing.*
 Aiming for a career within the fast food business? Looking for additional income during your studies? Either way we might have the right opportunity for you!
   

  

 All people are equal! To us that means equal opportunities, rights and obligations no matter who you are. The only limit is your own goals and results. We will guide you through with a clear plan, internal training and great opportunities to grow and develop with Sweden’s tastiest burger chain.
   

  

 Your job at the restaurant will include to serve our guests, prepare the food and make sure the restaurant is clean and tidy at all times. The main goal is to provide Sweden’s tastiest burgers, every day. The working hours will vary from daytime, evenings to nights and weekends. To make sure you get familiar with all aspects of the job you will be guided by your manager through digital and on-the-job training. Almost all of our managers have started their career in this very position.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 In order to fancy this job you need to love service and enjoy fast pace. You like to work in a team and are most effective when you get to be a part of a group. Quality is key to us so you need to be very orderly but at the same time keep up with the guest’s expectations on fast delivery.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 A fast paced fun job where everyone works closely together as well as great opportunities to grow and develop along with us. Terms and conditions are according to our collective agreement and we also offer health benefits to all employees.
   

  

 We welcome your application as soon as possible! Please note that the selection process will start immediately and that the position might be filled before the application deadline.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: deltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 2 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 50% | Ort: Södertälje | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/1034 | Publicerat: 2025-09-25 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-10-12

title: Reservation Agent Clarion Hotel Amaranten
description:
*About Clarion Hotel: Clarion Hotel® is not just a hotel chain; it's an immersive experience that combines Scandinavian hospitality with a touch of premium. Our team members are not merely employees; they are an integral part of the Clarion experience. We pride ourselves on delivering on personality, passion, and we always strive for perfection. Join us in shaping the future of hospitality! Clarion Hotel® is part of Strawberry.*
 Bli vår nästa Reservation Agent och skapa enastående hotellupplevelser
   

  

 Är du redo att bli en viktig del av vår vision? På Clarion Hotel Amaranten kombinerar vi urban stil, hög standard och en livlig atmosfär. Vårt mål är att varje gästupplevelse ska vara enastående. Nu söker vi en passionerad och driven Reservation Agent som vill vara den första kontakten för våra gäster och säkerställa en smidig och trevlig start på deras vistelse.
   

  

 Som Reservation Agent är du en nyckelperson i vår hotellverksamhet. Du är ansiktet utåt för gästen som bokar sin vistelse, och ditt arbete är avgörande för att säkerställa att varje gäst får en skräddarsydd upplevelse. Ditt engagemang för detaljer och din förmåga att skapa en personlig och smidig bokningsprocess har en direkt inverkan på gästernas totala hotellupplevelse.
   

  

 Om rollen
   

  

 I Den Här Rollen Hanterar Du En Bredd Av Uppgifter, Från Daglig Administration Till Aktiv Försäljning. Du Kommer Att Arbeta Med
   

  

* Bokningshantering: Ta emot och bekräfta individuella bokningar via telefon och e-post. Du ansvarar för att all bokningsdata är korrekt, från kundkort och företagsavtal till rätt priser och specialönskemål.
* Försäljning och intäktsoptimering: Arbeta aktivt med merförsäljning genom att erbjuda uppgraderingar och paket. Du ansvarar också för att maximera hotellets intäkter genom att hantera kampanjer, paket och presentkort i gott samarbete med Revenue-teamet.
* Administration: Hantera no-shows, sena avbokningar och provisioner. Du ansvarar för fakturering av månadsfakturor samt att uppdatera och underhålla hotellets väntelista.
* Kvalitetssäkring: Gå igenom inkomna bokningar för att säkerställa att allt från extrasängar och specifika önskemål till betalmedel är korrekt.
* Kommunikation och samarbete: Du har daglig kontakt med Revenue Manager, Sales- och M&E-avdelningen och andra kollegor för att säkerställa att bokningar är optimerade och att alla avdelningar har den information de behöver.


 Du rapporterar till vår Welcome Office Manager.
   

  

 Din profil
   

  

 Vi letar efter dig som har ett öga för detaljer, en stark arbetsmoral och en genuin passion för service. Du trivs med att arbeta i ett högt tempo och har en naturlig förmåga att prioritera och ta egna initiativ.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
* Erfarenhet: Erfarenhet av liknande arbete, gärna inom hotell- eller servicebranschen.
* Driv: Ett kommersiellt tänk och intresse för försäljning och intäktsoptimering.
* Flexibilitet: Förmåga att ta egna beslut och hantera flera arbetsuppgifter samtidigt.
* Personlighet: En positiv och pålitlig inställning som smittar av sig.
* Samarbete: God kommunikationsförmåga och en vilja att samarbeta med andra.
* Språkkunskaper: Flytande kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet: 3-5 års erfarenhet från hotellreception, kundtjänst eller projektledning.
* Systemkunskap: Vana av att arbeta med hotellsystem, särskilt MEWS och Flexkeeping.
* Språk: Ytterligare språkkunskaper utöver svenska och engelska.
* Analys: Erfarenhet av att arbeta i Excel och rapportera statistik.


 Anställningsvillkor
   

  

 Tjänsten är en 100% anställning med lön enligt kollektivavtal Visita/HRF. Vi tillämpar en 6 månaders provanställning.
   

  

 Arbetstiderna är i huvudsak måndag till fredag, men kvällar och helger kan förekomma.
   

  

 Om oss
   

  

 Hos oss på Clarion blir du en del av ett varumärke som kombinerar urban stil med högsta kvalitet. Vi sätter stort värde på våra medarbetare och erbjuder en inspirerande arbetsmiljö med högt tempo där dina insatser verkligen uppskattas. Du blir en del av Strawberry-koncernen, vilket ger dig goda möjligheter att avancera och utvecklas. Du får även tillgång till en rad förmåner, som personalrabatter och specialpriser på våra hotell, restauranger och barer.
   

  

**Är du redo att göra skillnad?** 
 Vänta inte, skicka in din ansökan redan idag för att bli en del av vårt team och hjälpa oss att skapa förstklassiga gästupplevelser. Vi behandlar ansökningar löpande.

title: Bioinformatician in In Situ Sequencing
emails: katarina.tiklova@scilifelab.se, chika.yokota@scilifelab.se, st@st.su.se, st@st.su.se, saco@saco.su.se, saco@saco.su.se, seko@seko.su.se, seko@seko.su.se
description:
**The Department of Biochemistry and Biophysics.** 
 SciLifeLab (SciLifeLab) is a national center for molecular biosciences with focus on health and environmental research. The center combines frontline technical expertise with advanced knowledge of translational medicine and molecular bioscience. SciLifeLab is a national resource hosted by Karolinska Institutet, KTH Royal Institute of Technology, Stockholm University and Uppsala University. The center also collaborates with several other universities.
   

  

 For more details about the facility, visit: www.scilifelab.se/facilities/in-situ-sequencing/.
   

  

 The employment will be placed at the Department of Biochemistry and Biophysics, at Stockholm university. More information about us, please visit: www.dbb.su.se.
   

  

 Main responsibilities
   

  

* Perform in-depth analysis of complex spatial transcriptomics / In situ sequencing datasets using established computational frameworks
* Ensure data management practices align with the FAIR (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reusable) principles, including metadata annotation and long-term storage solutions
* Provide expert support to researchers on all data-related aspects, from experimental design to analysis and interpretation
* Contribute to the development of integrative, multi-modal analysis pipelines for spatial omics datasets
* Design and implement novel analytical approaches and interactive visualizations tailored to high-dimensional multi-modal spatial data.


 Qualification requirements
   

  

**Required Qualifications**
* A PhD (or MSc with significant experience) in Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Systems Biology, or a related discipline
* Proficiency in Python and R, with experience in spatial transcriptomics data analysis and high-dimensional data visualization
* Demonstrated experience in building and maintaining reproducible and modular data analysis workflows
* Solid understanding of statistical methods and their application to transcriptomics and image-derived data
* Familiarity with public biological data repositories, metadata standards and best practices in open science
* A collaborative mindset, with the ability to work in interdisciplinary teams and communicate effectively with both computational and experimental scientists.


*Desirable (but not required)* 
 :
   

  

* Experience with imaging technologies (e.g., Xenium, MERFISH, seqFISH) and associated data formats
* Familiarity with cloud computing environments or high-performance computing clusters
* Knowledge of tissue segmentation, spatial registration, or histology-based data alignment.


*Personal Skills*
 We believe success in this role requires curiosity for biological questions and enthusiasm for learning new bioinformatics tools and methods. You enjoy working as part of a team, with a structured and quality-focused mindset. Strong communication skills, both spoken and written, are essential. We place great emphasis on personal qualities.
   

  

**About The Employment**
 This is a full-time, indefinite-term employment with a six-month probationary period. Stockholm University applies individual salary setting. Start date is as soon as possible.
   

  

 We offer
   

  

 With us, you will experience the dynamic interaction between higher education and research that makes Stockholm University an exciting and creative environment. You will work in an international environment and get favourable conditions.
   

  

 Stockholm University strives to be a workplace free from discrimination and with equal opportunities for all.
   

  

 Contact
   

  

 Further information about the position can be obtained from Katarina Tiklova, katarina.tiklova@scilifelab.se, or Chika Yokota chika.yokota@scilifelab.se.
   

  

 Application
   

  

 Apply for the position at Stockholm University's recruitment system. It is the responsibility of the applicant to ensure that the application is complete and that it is submitted before the deadline.
   

  

 The instructions for applicants are available at: How to apply for a position.
   

  

 Stockholm University contributes to the development of sustainable democratic society through knowledge, enlightenment and the pursuit of truth.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100 % | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: SU FV-3415-25 | Facklig företrädare: ST/OFR st@st.su.se, ST/OFR st@st.su.se, Saco-S saco@saco.su.se, Saco-S saco@saco.su.se, Seko seko@seko.su.se, Seko seko@seko.su.se, | Publicerat: 2025-09-25 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-10-31

title: Master Security Specialist - PSIRT
description:
**Grow with us**
**About This Opportunity**
 Ericsson PSIRT is the single point of contact for security matters across all Ericsson products. We are an essential coordination point between internal functions; from the customer units and global support organizations, through into product development and frameworks, and with external entities including; customers, security communities, vulnerability finders and much more. Our central role also covers product security situational awareness for the Ericsson portfolio, which is used in our Threat Landscape and other Threat Intelligence deliverables.
   

  

 We bring our individual security expertise to facilitate security contexts in our daily engagements and champion world-class security through our coordination of cases and initiatives. We seek an experienced security professional to join our skilled team spanning Finland, Sweden and Germany.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 Our ideal candidate has experience coordinating incidents and vulnerabilities in a product context with proven application of skills within a Product Security team; ideally a PSIRT. Has extensive background in a product development, deployment or operations team and extensive expertise in one or more of the following domains: vulnerability management, security incident response and/or security incident management. Additionally, a background in mobile network operations or architecture would be highly valued.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Vulnerability & Incident Coordination: Investigate, support, and/or lead product security-related vulnerability coordination and incident response support alongside Customer Security Directors, Customers / Customer Units, Enterprise Security, and other stakeholders.
* Vulnerability Management Operations & Development: Routine vulnerability monitoring, alerting, and verification operations, alongside improvements to quality and automation.
* Advisory Role: Act as PSIRT’s representative, advising other Ericsson organizations on product security issues.
* Process Improvement: Contribute to and enhance existing end-to-end product security processes, such as Vulnerability Management, from development to customer engagement.
* External Representation: Represent Ericsson in external forums and communities such as FIRST, ETIS, GSMA, etc., demonstrating our security leadership by contributing our knowledge, expertise and experiences.


**Join our Team**
**The Skills You Bring**
* Strong ability to investigate and assess own-code and 3rd party vulnerabilities, with communications (CVE, CWE, CVSS).
* Solid incident response and incident management background, applying industry best practices under pressure alongside diverse stakeholders.
* Good familiarity with product development and/or product management practices with adequate technical knowledge/experience
* Ability to communicate with a global and diverse set of stakeholders in high-stress situations.
* Team player, innovative, high-collaborative, problem solver, and service-minded personality.
* Flexibility & willingness to work across multiple time zones in virtual teams and occasionally support ongoing coordination outside of normal working hours.


**Highly regarded skills, education, certificates and community participation:**
* Experience in a PSIRT is highly regarded!
* Strong scripting skills and ability to troubleshoot existing code/scripts in Bash and Python.
* Digital Forensics and Incident Response in Linux environments, ideally in mobile networks.
* Coding capability with a strong focus on automation.
* Security certifications such as CompTIA Security+, OSCP, CISM, or CISSP.
* Active involvement and contribution to the global security community (e.g., FIRST, TI/TF-CSIRT).
* Minimum of a bachelor’s degree in computer science, cybersecurity, information security, telecommunications, or a related technical area, or equivalent practical experience.


 To be considered for this opportunity please include a cover letter to your application addressing the key criteria in the above job advertisement to demonstrate your suitability and interest in this position.
   

  

 Note: Approved security clearance/security vetting is required for the position and will be carried out for the selected applicant. (Finland Security Clearance Act 726/2014)
   

  

 Locations/Point of hire: Stockholm, Helsinki or Düsseldorf
   

  

**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Finland (FI) || Jorvas
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 769825

title: Agency & Client Manager
description:
At Viaplay Group, we entertain millions of people every day through our streaming services, radio networks, and TV channels. We believe in the power of content not just as a way of telling stories and touching lives, but also expanding worlds.
   

  

 We’re looking for the best people to join us on our journey. Right now, we’re searching for a
 **Agency & Client Manager** 
 in our
 **Stockholm office** 
 – are you ready to hit play on an exciting career change?
   

  

**The role** 
  

  

 We’re looking for a driven and relationship-focused sales professional to join our team at Viaplay Group. In this role, you’ll be responsible for growing advertising sales across our free-to-air TV channels, sports channels, and digital platforms. You’ll build strong partnerships with agencies and advertisers, identify new opportunities, and negotiate impactful deals that deliver value for both our clients and Viaplay Group.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Drive sales of commercial advertising space across Viaplay Group’s TV and digital platforms.
* Build and maintain long-term strategic relationships with media agencies and advertisers to meet revenue targets.
* Proactively identify new business opportunities and create added value for existing clients.
* Prospect and onboard new customers while fostering sustainable partnerships.
* Negotiate annual contracts and ad hoc deals in line with agreed pricing and volume targets, in close collaboration with the Sales & Trading Director.
* Use key market insights—such as price levels, audience groups, and trends—to strengthen negotiations.
* Confidently present and position Viaplay Group’s product portfolio to potential clients.
* Handle administrative tasks related to campaign bookings and ensure smooth delivery, compliance, and follow-up on client agreements.
* Regularly lead and participate in external sales presentations.


 What we’re looking for
   

  

 We understand you may feel confident ticking certain boxes more than others and that’s why we always keep an open mind in our recruitment process. But, in order to thrive in this role, we do believe you’ll have at least some experience in the following:
   

  

* Background in Key Account Management, with media sales experience being highly valuable.
* University degree or higher education in a relevant field is considered a merit.
* Strong knowledge and understanding of TV and digital advertising, including OLV and programmatic.
* Excellent negotiation and presentation skills.
* Ability to analyze customer needs and identify growth opportunities.
* Outstanding communication skills in both Swedish and English, written and spoken.
* A self-starter with high energy, a team-oriented mindset, and a genuine passion for building long-term partnerships.
* A can-do attitude, sense of humor and the ability to work humbly with others.


 What we offer you
   

  

* We’ve got you covered! 30 days of paid vacation every year, summer hours, an attractive pension and insurance scheme, and generous parental leave pay lift.
* Your wellbeing matters. We provide you with various wellbeing initiatives including wellness allowance.
* A safe space to grow and up-skill. Our learning culture puts you in the driver’s seat of your own development.
* Entertainment is what we love, and entertainment is what we do. So, unlimited access to Viaplay seems only fair for you to get to know the product – including serier & viewing events, new release movie rentals, linear channels and more.


**Hit play today** 
  

  

 If this feels like your kind of challenge, make sure you apply by attaching your CV here – you may also want to add your LinkedIn profile. Please don’t send us your application via email because we won’t be able to accept it. We do, however, welcome any questions you may have about this particular position.
   

  

 Want to learn more about who we are and what we do? Check out our careers page or follow us on Instagram! We’re only ever a few clicks away.

title: Affärsutvecklare och Managementkonsult – ansvarig för proaktiv försäljning
description:
**Om B3 Business Transformation**
**B3 Business Transformation** 
 är experter på att initiera, driva och genomföra förändring för att öka verksamhetsnytta genom AI och digitalisering. Initiativ som ofta kräver utveckling av både arbetssätt, ledning och teknik. Vi består idag av ett 50-tal erfarna managementkonsulter och är ett av de större specialistbolagen inom B3-koncernen. Tillsammans med våra systerbolag erbjuder vi allt ifrån strategisk rådgivning och ledning till utveckling och förvaltning av verksamhetskritiska IT-projekt och digitala transformationer. Våra kunder finns i flera branscher, inom både privat och offentlig sektor.
   

  

**Rollen**
 Ditt främsta uppdrag är att skapa värde för våra kunder och bidra till lönsam tillväxt för bolaget. Det gör du genom att vidareutveckla befintliga relationer och bygga förtroende hos nya kunder som vill ta nästa steg med AI och digitalisering. Rollen kombinerar proaktivt sälj med rådgivning i tidiga skeden och förmåga att leda agila team för större genomföranden.
   

  

**Du kommer att**
* Vidareutveckla befintliga kundrelationer och skapa nya affärer.
* Agera senior rådgivare och ledare i större kunduppdrag som du initierat, särskilt i tidiga skeden.
* Ansvara för vårt proaktiva sälj som en del av ledningsgruppen och bidra i GTM och erbjudande.


**Din profil**
 För att lyckas i den här rollen vill vi att du har:
   

  

* Minst 10 års erfarenhet av affärsutveckling och försäljning inom IT, digitalisering eller konsultbranschen.
* Minst 10 års erfarenhet av att genomföra uppdrag som managementkonsult eller senior rådgivare till ledningsgrupper och högre beslutsfattare.
* Förståelse och intresse för hur AI och digitalisering skapar verksamhetsnytta.


 Meriterande om du även har:
   

  

* Etablerat nätverk med beslutsfattare inom en eller flera relevanta branscher
* Erfarenhet av att leda större program och teamleveranser
* Bidragit till bolagsutveckling i en ledningsgrupp eller annan senior roll.


**Personliga egenskaper**
* Affärsdriven och resultatorienterad med förmåga att etablera och utveckla långsiktiga kundrelationer.
* Trygg i rådgivarrollen, van att arbeta nära kundens ledning.
* Initiativrik och samarbetsorienterad – du trivs med att kombinera eget ansvar med lagarbete.


**Vi erbjuder**
 En senior roll med stort ansvar och möjlighet att påverka vår gemensamma utveckling. Kombinationen av affärsutveckling och rådgivande konsultuppdrag. Att arbeta i framkant av AI och digitalisering. B3-koncernens entreprenöriella och prisbelönta kultur.

title: 13.Säkerhetsbataljon söker stabsassistent till stabsexpeditionen
description:
**Om Operativa säkerhetsförbandet 13.Säkerhetsbataljon**
 Operativa säkerhetsförbandet 13.Säkerhetsbataljon är ett operativt försvarsmaktsgemensamt krigsförband med hög materiel och personell tillgänglighet som ska kunna verka i hela konfliktskalan. Bataljonens huvuduppgift är att upptäcka, klarlägga och motverka säkerhetshotande verksamhet i form av främmande underrättelseinhämtning, kriminalitet, terrorism, sabotage och subversion som riktas mot Försvarsmaktens prioriterade skyddsvärden.
   

  

 Bataljonen verkar preventivt genom säkerhetsunderrättelsetjänst och säkerhetsskyddshöjande åtgärder.
   

  

 Vår vision är att 13.Säkerhetsbataljon bryter motståndarens förnekelsebarhet, och skapar förutsättningar för hela Försvarsmakten att möta varje hot och klara varje utmaning.
   

  

 Vill du vara med och bidra till att öka säkerheten på 13.Säkerhetsbataljon genom att arbeta med säkerhetsskyddshöjande åtgärder?
   

  

**Nu söker vi chef och stabsassistenter till Bataljonens stabsexpedition.**
* Säkerhetsbataljon leder, samordnar och utvecklar i huvudsak underrättelse- och säkerhetstjänst. Bataljonen består av en bataljonsstab, som innefattar sektioner med inriktning på personaltjänst, underrättelse- och säkerhetstjänst, genomförande, logistik, planering och samband/ledning. Stabsexpeditionen (STEX) består av en chef stabsexpedition och två stabsassistenter. STEX ansvarar huvudsakligen för bataljonens in- och utgående information inom ramen för säkerhetsoperationer samt understödjer informationsledaren i utvecklingen av bataljonens informationshanteringstjänst.


 Som stabsassistent vid 13.Säkerhetsbataljon STEX finns stora möjligheter att utveckla kompetens och erfarenhet inom informationshanteringstjänst och stabstjänst i insatsverksamhet. Hos oss är du en nyckelfunktion för ledningen av säkerhetsoperationer. Vi söker nu dig till att tjänstgöra hos oss på bataljonen med arbetsort Kungsängen. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och genomför kontinuerligt utbildningar för att bibehålla och utveckla kompetensen internt.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter** 
 Som stabassistent vid stabsexpeditionen kommer du
   

  

* bemanna bataljonsstabens STEX
* understödja bataljonsstaben i övrigt arbete, exempelvis vid insatsplanering eller ordergivningar
* understödja signalskyddschefen med hantering av signalskyddsystem och handlingar


 Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
* Genomförd och godkänd militär grundutbildning
* Körkort B


**Meriterande**
* Förarbevis: LPTGB, TPTGB, TLB
* Erfarenhet och utbildning i stabsexpeditionstjänst
* Utbildning inom signalskydd
* God förmåga i hanterande av IT-system
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med sekretessbelagd information
* Körkort B manuell


**Personliga egenskaper**
 Befattningen stabsassistent STEX ställer krav på god samarbetsförmåga och social kompetens. Då arbetstempot ofta varierar med snabba omväxlingar förutsätter det att du har en hög stresstålighet och uthållighet samt förmåga att tempoväxla. Arbetet innebär hantering av sekretessklassificerad information vilket ställer krav på att du är prestigelös och har hög personlig integritet. Du är initiativtagande och engagerad med god förmåga att självständigt planera och lösa uppgifter som kan sträcka sig över längre eller kortare tid.
   

  

*För att myndighetens uppdrag ska vara framgångsrikt förutsätts att alla medarbetare uppträder enligt den värdegrund som finns. Försvarsmaktens värdegrund slår vakt om alla människors lika värde, rättsvisa och jämlikhet och främjar demokrati och mänskliga rättigheter (läs mer på* 
*www.forsvarsmakten.se* 
*).*
**Övrigt**
 Arbetsort: Kungsängen
   

  

 Anställningsform: Tidsbegränsad anställning. 6 månaders provanställning tillämpas vid nyanställning.
   

  

 Tillträde till tjänsten: Enligt ök.
   

  

 Rekryteringsprocessen består av intervjuer och referenstagning. Kandidater kallas löpande till intervju.
   

  

 Upplysningar om befattningen: LG-13sakbat-s6@mil.se
   

  

 Information om rekryteringsprocessen: LG-13sakbat-rekrytering@mil.se
   

  

**Fackliga företrädare**
 Örjan Jansson OFR/S
   

  

 Orry Finnermark & Sven Lundberg ORF/O
   

  

 Lise-Lott Larsson SEKO
   

  

 Per Textorius SACO
   

  

 Samtliga nås via: 08-584 540 00
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan senast
 **2025-11-16** 
 . Din ansökan bör innehålla CV samt ansökningsbrev där du motiverar varför du är lämpad för denna befattning.
   

  

 ,
 **Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Försvarsmaktens webbplats.** 
 -------------------------------------------------------- Information om Försvarsmakten och det rekryterande förbandet: Livgardet är ett av Försvarsmaktens största förband med anor från 1521. Vi utbildar morgondagens soldater, liksom militärpoliser och personal som ska genomföra internationell insats. Vi bevakar de kungliga slotten, vi har säkerhets- och markstridsförband. Vi ansvarar också för att bevara och utveckla svensk militärmusiktradition. Vårt huvudsäte är i Kungsängen utanför Stockholm, men vi finns också i Sollentuna, i centrala Stockholm, Uppsala, Göteborg och Karlskrona. Inom Försvarsmakten finns en stark värdegrund som bygger på öppenhet, resultat och ansvar. Professionell utveckling och personlig hälsa värdesätts och uppmuntras. Det finns goda förutsättningar för intern karriärrörlighet, friskvård samt bra balans mellan arbete och privatliv. En anställning hos oss innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Vanligtvis krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt 3 kap i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. I anställningen ingår även en skyldighet att tjänstgöra utomlands. Innebörden av detta varierar beroende på typ av befattning. Till ansökan om anställning ska CV och personligt brev bifogas. Om du går vidare i anställningsprocessen ska alltid vidimerade kopior av betyg och intyg uppvisas. Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.

title: Field Application Engineer FPGA
company_industry: Appliances, Electrical, and Electronics Manufacturing and Semiconductor Manufacturing
description:
Are you looking for a unique opportunity to be a part of something great? Want to join a 17,000-member team that works on the technology that powers the world around us? Looking for an atmosphere of trust, empowerment, respect, diversity, and communication? How about an opportunity to own a piece of a multi-billion dollar (with a B!) global organization? We offer all that and more at Microchip Technology, Inc.
   

  

 People come to work at Microchip because we help design the technology that runs the world. They stay because our culture supports their growth and stability. They are challenged and driven by an incredible array of products and solutions with unlimited career potential. Microchip’s nationally-recognized Leadership Passage Programs support career growth where we proudly enroll over a thousand people annually. We take pride in our commitment to employee development, values-based decision making, and strong sense of community, driven by our Vision, Mission, and 11 Guiding Values; we affectionately refer to it as the
 *Aggregate System* 
 and it’s won us countless awards for diversity and workplace excellence.
   

  

 Our company is built by dedicated team players who love to challenge the status quo; we did not achieve record revenue and over 30 years of quarterly profitability without a great team dedicated to empowering innovation. People like you.
   

  

 Visit our careers page to see what exciting opportunities and company perks await!
   

  

**Job Description**
 As an FPGA Field Application Engineer (FAE), you will engage with clients to create technical solutions while identifying and building new business using your engineering expertise. You will be expected to reframe their thinking and build consensus for Microchip’s solutions, co-creating value by delivering the freedom to innovate.
   

  

**The Role Responsibilities Are**
* Provides pre-sales and post-sales technical support for the development and implementation of complex products, applications, and solutions across all Microchip product lines, with an emphasis on FPGAs.
* To be an authority on all phases of programmable logic design, including requirements analysis, HDL code development and simulation, embedded hard and soft processor system design, synthesis optimizations, place and route constraints, timing closure, board-level schematic reviews, and FPGA hardware development and debug tools.
* Advise on the implementation of innovative ideas and solutions for assigned clients.
* Utilize engineering design skills, techniques, and knowledge to help the client decrease time to market, reduce overall system cost and improve end-product performance.
* Utilize the Microchip Client Engagement Process to drive design wins to revenue at assigned clients
* Use insight and influencing skills to offer clients unique perspectives on technology that links to Microchip solutions.
* Identify key client stakeholders and coach them to build consensus for Microchip solutions within their organization.
* Contribute and participate within a global team environment to successfully develop and implement strategies for assigned clients across all global locations.
* Communicate effectively with Microchip Business Units for technical assistance and provide quantifiable feedback to measure ROI in assigned client investments (solutions and products).
* Coach, mentor, and train other FAEs as needed.
* Assist launches of new product introductions.


**Requirements/Qualifications**
* 5+ years of relevant industry experience with FPGA-based architecture definition, design, and support, includingHigh-Speed Serial IO and/or Embedded Processor.
* 5+ years of experience with lab equipment such as oscilloscopes and signal analyzers.
* 5+ years of experience in semiconductor applications/sales.
* Strong problem-solving and debugging skills, with the ability to work in a matrixed team environment.
* Familiarity with aerospace products and designs are a bonus.
* A Bachelor's Degree, or higher, in Electronics Engineering or Computer Science with a strong academic track record.
* Embedded Linux knowledge is a plus.
* Must be able to speak and write in English fluently.


 Competencies
   

  

* Strategic/Critical Thinking—Systematically solves problems and hypothesizes possible client pain points, expectations, and implicit needs; brainstorms with team members to devise solutions to solve complex client challenges.
* Communication—Tailors communication to the client’s needs with authority; effectively delivers presentations and has strong verbal and written communication skills.
* Interpersonal Influence—Uses rational and emotional drivers that would appeal to clients to drive conversations to elements of value for both parties.
* Networking—Identifies the right client stakeholders and builds connections quickly to drive consensus for design wins; works cooperatively with a wide range of internal stakeholders for success.
* Ownership—Goes out of his or her way to complete a task and has a relentless drive to achieve results; is independent, self-directed, and takes initiative.
* Workflow/Project Management—Sets clear, realistic, and time-bound objectives that align to business growth; breaks each objective into tasks and process steps that can be achieved within a realistic timeframe.
* Adaptability – Ability to manage multiple customer engagements simultaneously, and work with client design teams across a variety of markets and applications. Identify and communicate Microchip product differentiators targeting specific customer products.


**Travel Time**
 50% - 75%
   

  

**To all recruitment agencies** 
 :
 *Microchip Technology Inc.
 **does not** 
 accept unsolicited agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our recruiting team or other Microchip employees. Microchip is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.*

title: Pricing Manager
description:
Do you want to work with complex pricing, financial analyses and dive transformation improvement? We are looking for an analytical
 **Pricing Manager** 
 to join our team at CWS!
 



  





 The Pricing Manager is responsible for managing all price updates within CWS and participating in the development of an automated pricing process to ensure consistent execution across Foxway’s operations. The role involves setting appropriate price levels that align with margin requirements and developing data-driven models and processes to improve pricing accuracy within the industry. The position reports directly to the Director of Deal Desk and is considered a key function at CWS due to its business-critical nature.
 



  





 Foxway offers a dynamic, forward-thinking work environment where your strategic leadership will shape pricing processes, drive profitability, and influence company-wide growth. We strive to create a workplace that fosters innovation, personal development, and high-impact collaboration.
 



  





**What you will do as a Pricing Manager:** 



* Guarantee accuracy in pricing and optimise margins
* Advance pricing and valuation strategies, such as determining optimal risk-adjusted residual values
* Continuously analyse outcomes to identify enhancements to strategies, tools, and methodologies
* Lead cross-functional initiatives focused on increasing profitability
* Develop frameworks and dashboards to monitor gross margins



  





**We envision that you** 
 are a structured and analytical problem-solver who excels in collaborative environments with equally skilled colleagues. You approach challenges with enthusiasm and embrace steep learning curves. To succeed in this role, you should have experience building advanced models in Excel/Google Sheets and SQL, as well as automating and scaling analyses using modern AI tools. You are a communicative, solution-oriented team player who is both self-driven and humble, with a knack for uncovering new opportunities through data and AI-driven insights. In addition to being self-motivated, cooperative, and goal-oriented, the ideal candidate possesses:
 



  




* A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Business, Finance, Economics, or a related field.
* 1-3 years of experience in pricing, commercial strategy, or financial analysis, preferably in IT, leasing, or circular economy sectors, and/or experience from a top-tier consulting firm
* Proven expertise in developing sophisticated financial models and conducting advanced data analysis
* Familiarity with leveraging AI-based tools to improve efficiency and accuracy of analytical work
* Strong written and verbal communication skills, particularly in simplifying complex analyses
* Additional consideration for proficiency in SQL and programming



  





**To thrive and succeed with us…** 




 You are analytical, growth-oriented, and passionate about creating long-term value through data-driven insights and strategic leadership. You embrace change, thrive in a fast-paced environment, and are energized by transformation. Your proactive mindset, curiosity, and ability to collaborate across teams make you a valuable change agent at Foxway.
 



  





**Why work with us?** 




 • Be part of a company that contributes to a more circular and sustainable future.
 



 • Work in a culture that encourages ambition, collaboration, and learning.
 



 • Gain opportunities for personal development and strategic career growth.
 



  





 We review applications continuously. For more information, feel free to contact our TA Partner Ellen at
 **ellen.berggren@foxway.com** 
 .

title: SAP PM/EAM Konsult
description:
Position Description
   

  

 Känner du dig nyfiken på nya utmaningar som som SAP Plant Maintenance konsult? Vill du jobba på en flexibel arbetsplats där du får jobba med spännande uppdrag? Vi söker nu erfarna SAP PM/EAM konsulter till vårt härliga team i Stockholm!
   

  

 CGI är ett av världens största oberoende tjänsteföretag inom IT och affärsprocesser och vi har ett nära samarbete med SAP som Guldpartner. På den svenska marknaden är vi en av de största SAP-leverantörerna, med en aktiv och nationell SAP Practice där vi utbyter kunskap och erfarenhet med varandra.
   

  

 Välkommen till CGI!
   

  

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

 I rollen som SAP Plant Maintenance (SAP PM/EAM) konsult hos CGI kommer du att vara en viktig kugge i leveransen gentemot våra kunder och ingå i ett team med mycket kunniga och trevliga kollegor. Du kommer även att ha möjligheten att utveckla och växa CGIs SAP team inom området Plant Manintenance, samt samarbeta med våra konsulter på Business Consulting inom detta verksamhetsområde. Främst arbetar vi i rena implementations- eller förbättringsprojekt, men vi är även stolta över de fina AM-tjänster vi levererar till flera kunder. Så har du erfarenhet av och trivs i förvaltningsleveranser finns även den möjligheten.
   

  

 Vårt övergripande SAP-erbjudande sträcker sig över områden som bland annat S/4HANA, S/4HANA Cloud, SuccessFactors, User Experience, Ariba, och Concur, men såklart också med kunder som ännu inte tagit steget till den nya SAP-plattformen. I vårt team finns det goda utvecklingsmöjligheter och det är egentligen bara du själv som sätter stopp för hur långt du kan utvecklas. Vi satsar på våra konsulter och lägger stort fokus på att våra medarbetare mår bra.
   

  

**Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role**
 Vi ser att du har minst fem års erfarenhet av SAP Plant Maintenance (SAP PM/EAM) och relaterade verksamhetsprocesser. Om du inte redan arbetat i S/4HANA ser vi att det är viktigt att du är nyfiken på området och beredd att göra en kompetensresa, inkluderat SAP nya lösningar inom området.
   

  

 För den här rollen kommer vi att lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper. Rollen som konsult innebär en omväxlande vardag där du behöver ha en förmåga och drivkraft att bygga och utveckla goda relationer för att skapa en stark samarbetsförmåga. För att framgångsrikt kunna lösa de utmaningar som du och ditt team ställs inför söker vi dig med ett analytiskt tänk och en kreativ problemlösningsförmåga. För att trivas hos oss bör du dessutom ha en affärsmässig inställning, ett stort eget driv och gilla utmaningar.
   

  

 För den här rollen är det ett krav att du kan tala svenska obehindrat.
   

  

 Tjänsten är en heltidstjänst, med placering i Stockholm, och normalt sker arbete ifrån vårt kontor i centrala Stockholm och ditt eget hemmakontor.
   

  

**Tycker du detta låter intressant?**
 Vad roligt! Sök till tjänsten redan nu då vi rekryterar löpande. Har du funderingar så kontakta gärna mig, Nina Broman som är rekryterande chef för denna tjänsten på: Nina.b.Broman@cgi.com.
   

  

**Together, as owners, let’s turn meaningful insights into action.**
 Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you’ll reach your full potential because…
   

  

 You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That’s why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company’s strategy and direction.
   

  

 Your work creates value. You’ll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.
   

  

 You’ll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You’ll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.
   

  

 Come join our team—one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.
   

  

 SAP PM/EAM Konsult
